control.toolTip: {h3 style="margin: auto 0in"}{span lang="EN-IN" style='font-family: "arial","sans-serif"'}{font size="4"}{font color="#000080"}Previous Master Record Number {o:p}{/o:p}{/font}{/font}{/span}{/h3}{span lang="EN-IN" style='line-height: 115%; font-family: "arial","sans-serif"; color: black; font-size: 9.5pt; mso-fareast-font-family: calibri; mso-fareast-language: en-us; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-ansi-language: en-in; mso-bidi-language: ar-sa'}If you renumber customers and/or vendors when implementing the FI System, you can store the previous master record number in this field.{/span}
